Verses: 1 indha Nagaraththile Thariththirukkiravan Pattayaththaalum, Panjaththaalum, Kollai Noyaalum Saavaan; Kaldheyaridaththukkup Purappattuppogiravano Uyirodiruppaan; Avanudaiya Praanan Avanukkuk Kidaiththa Kollaiyudaimaiyaippolirukkum; Avan Pizhaippaanenbadhaik Karththar Uraikkiraar Endrum,
2 indha Nagaram Baabilon Raajaavinudaiya Raanuvaththin Kaiyil Nichchayamaaga Oppukkodukkappadum; Avan Adhaip Pidippaanenbadhaik Karththar Uraikkiraar Endrum,

3 eremiyaa Ellaa Janaththodum Sollikkondirundha Vaarththaigalai Maaththaanin Kumaaranaagiya Seppaththiyaavum, Paskoorin Kumaaranaagiya Kedhaliyaavum, Selemiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoogaalum, Malkiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paskoorum Kettaargal.

4 appozhudhu Prabukkal Raajaavai Nokki: Indha Manushan Kollappada Uththaravaagavendum; Adhenendraal, Indha Nagaraththil Meedhiyaayirukkira Yuththa Manusharidaththilum, Matrumulla Sagala Janangalidaththilum, Ivan Ippadippatta Vaarththaigalai Sollugiradhinaale Avargaludaiya Kaigalaith Thalarndhupogappannugiraan; Ivan Indha Janaththin Shemaththaith Thedaamal, Avargal Kettaiye Thedugiraan Endraargal.
5 appozhudhu Sidhekkiyaa Raajaa: Idho, Avan Ungal Kaigalil Irukkiraan; Ungalukku Virodhamaai Raajaa Ondrum Seyyakkoodaadhu Endraan.

6 appozhudhu Avargal Eremiyaavaip Pidiththu, Avanaik Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththilirundha Ammelegin Kumaaranaagiya Malkiyaavinudaiya Thuravile Pottaargal; Eremiyaavaik Kayirugalinaal Adhile Irakkivittaargal; Andhath Thuravile Thanneer Illaamal Ulaiyaayirundhadhu, Andha Ulaiyile Eremiyaa Amizhndhinaan.
7 avargal Eremiyaavaith Thuravile Pottadhai Raajaavin Aramanaiyil Irundha Eththiyoppiyanaagiya Epedhmelek Ennum Oru Pradhaani Kelvippattaan; Raajaavo Benyameen Vaasalile Utkaarndhirundhaan.
8 appozhudhu Epedhmelek Raajaavin Aramanaiyilirundhu Purappattuppoi, Raajaavai Nokki:

9 raajaavaagiya En Aandavane, Indhap Purushar Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaith Thuravile Pottu Seydhadhu Ellaam Thagaadha Seygaiyaayirukkiradhu; Avan Irukkira Idaththile Pattiniyinaal Saavaane, Ini Nagaraththile Appamillai Endraan.

10 appozhudhu Raajaa Epedhmelek Ennum Eththiyoppiyanai Nokki: Nee Ivvidaththilirundhu Muppadhu Manusharai Unnudane Koottikkondupoi, Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Saagaadhadharkumunne Avanaith Thuravilirundhu Thookkividu Endru Kattalaiyittaan.

11 appozhudhu Epedhmelek Andha Manusharaith Thannudane Koottikkondu, Raajaavin Aramanaip Pokkishasaalaiyin Keezhirundha Araikkul Pugundhu, Kizhindhupona Pazhampudavaigalaiyum Kandhaith Thunigalaiyum Eduththukkondupoi, Avaigalaik Kayirugalinaal Eremiyaavandaikkuth Thuravile Irakkivittu,

12 epedhmelek Ennum Eththiyoppiyan Eremiyaavudane: Kizhindhupona Indhap Pazhampudavaigalaiyum Kandhaigalaiyum Ummudaiya Akkulgalil Kayirugalukkul Adangavaiththup Pottukkollum Endraan: Eremiyaa Appadiye Seydhaan.
13 appozhudhu Eremiyaavaik Kayirugalaal Thookki, Avanaith Thuravilirundhu Eduththuvittaargal; Eremiyaa Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththil Irundhaan.

14 pinbu Sidhekkiyaa Raajaa, Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisiyaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilirukkum Moondraam Vaasalile Thannidaththirku Varavazhaiththaan; Ange Raajaa, Eremiyaavai Nokki: Naan Unnidaththil Oru Kaariyam Ketkiren; Nee Enakku Ondrum Maraikkavendaam Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Sidhekkiyaavai Nokki: Naan Adhai Umakku Ariviththaal Ennai Nichchayamaaik Kolaiseyveerallavaa? Naan Umakku Aalosanai Sonnaalum, En Sollaik Ketkamaatteer Endraan.

16 appozhudhu Sidhekkiyaa Raajaa: Naan Unnaik Kollaamalum, Un Praananai Vaangaththedugira Indha Manushar Kaiyil Unnai Oppukkodaamalum Iruppen Enbadhai, Namakku Indha Aaththumaavai Undupannina Karththarudaiya Jeevanaik Kondu Sollugiren Endru Eremiyaavukku Ragasiyamaai Aanaiyittaan.

17 appozhudhu Eremiyaa Sidhekkiyaavai Nokki: Neer Baabilon Raajaavin Prabukkalandaikkup Purappattuppoveeraanaal, Ummudaiya Aaththumaa Uyirodirukkum; Indhap Pattanam Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappaduvadhillai; Neerum Ummudaiya Kudumbamum Uyirodiruppeergal.

18 neer Baabilon Raajaavin Prabukkalidaththirkup Purappattuppogaavittaal Appozhudhu Indha Nagaram Kaldheyar Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappadum, Avargal Idhai Akkiniyaal Sutterippaargal; Neer Avargalukkuk Thappippovadhillai Engiradhai Isravelin Dhevanum Senaigalin Dhevanumaagiya Karththarsollugiraar Endraan.
19 appozhudhu Sidhekkiyaa Raajaa Eremiyaavai Nokki: Kaldheyar Thangalai Serndhupona Yoodharin Kaiyile Ennaip Pariyaasampanna Oppukkoduppaargalo Endru Naan Aiyappadugiren Endraan.
20 adharku Eremiyaa: Ummai Oppukkodaargal; Naan Ummidaththil Sollugira Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalukku Sevikodum, Appozhudhu Umakku Nanmaiyaayirukkum, Ummudaiya Aaththumaa Pizhaikkum.
21 naan Purappadugiradhillai Enbeereyaagil, Karththar Enakkuth Theriyappaduththina Vaarththaiyaavadhu:

22 idho, Yoodhaa Raajaavin Veettile Meedhiyaana Ellaa Sthreegalum Veliye Baabilon Raajaavin Prabukkalandaiyil Kondupogappaduvaargal; Appozhudhu, Idho, Avargaldhaane Ummudaiya Ishtargal; Avargal Umakkup Podhanai Seydhu, Ummai Merkondaargal Endrum, Ummudaiya Kaalgal Ulaiyile Amizhndhinapinbu Avargal Pinvaangipponaargal Endrum Andha Sthreegale Solluvaargal.

23 ummudaiya Ellaa Sthreegalaiyum, Ummudaiya Pillaigalaiyum Veliye Kaldheyaridaththil Kondupovaargal; Neerum Avargal Kaikkuth Thappip Pogaamal Baabilon Raajaavin Kaiyinaal Pidikkappattu, Indha Nagaram Akkiniyaal Sutterikkappadak Kaaranamaayiruppeer Endraan.
24 appozhudhu Sidhekkiyaa Eremiyaavai Nokki: Indha Vaarththaigalai Oruvarukkum Arivikkavendaam; Appozhudhu Nee Saavadhillai.

25 naan Unnode Pesinadhaip Prabukkal Kelvippattu, Unnidaththil Vandhu: Nee Raajaavode Pesikkondadhai Engalukkuth Therivi, Engalukku Ondrum Maraikkaadhe, Appozhudhu Unnaik Kollaadhiruppom; Raajaa Unnodu Enna Pesinaar Endru Unnaik Ketpaargaleyaagil,
26 naan Yonaththaanudaiya Veettile Saagaadhapadikku Raajaa Ennai Ange Thirumba Anuppavendaam Endru, Avar Mugaththukku Munbaaga Vinnappam Panninen Endru Solvaayaaga Endraan.

27 pinbu Ellaap Prabukkalum, Eremiyaavinidaththil Vandhu, Avanaik Kettaargal; Appozhudhu Avan: Raajaa Karpiththa Indha Ellaa Vaarththaigalinpadiye Avargalukku Ariviththaan; Kaariyam Kelvippadaamarponapadiyinaal, Avanode Pesaamalirundhuvittaargal.
28 appadiye Eremiyaa, Erusalem Pidipadugira Naalmattaagak Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththil Irundhaan; Erusalem Pidipattupponapodhum Angeye Irundhaan.
